title: Linear Statistical Model
description: Basic unifying theory underlying techniques of regression, analysis of variance and covariance, from a geometric point of view.  Modern computational capabilities are exploited fully.  Students apply the theory to real data through canned and coded programs.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
